Job Title: Regional Controller

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Description

The Regional Controller oversees (and assists as needed) Operating Unit accounting and finance staff and provides guidance and direction. Assists Operating Unit Presidents with financial and project analysis as needed. Provides the corporate office with related information required by them to carry out their assigned responsibilities. Maintains the companys system of accounts and keeps books and records on all company transactions and assets for the region. Assures protection for the assets of the business through internal controls and monitoring performance.

Job Functions

Keeps the COO and CFO informed of the companys performance and provides advice on all financial matters within the RegionIs seen as a business partner and resource for the Operating Unit Presidents within the RegionEvaluate the performance of accounting and finance personnel within the Region and recommend training and changes as neededEnsures accurate and timely preparation of monthly and annual Operating Unit financial statementsEnsures Tectas delegation of authority and corporate policies are adhered toProvides corporate office with relevant audit, tax, insurance, and other information as neededEnsures credit and collection procedures are followed, and monitors collections and paymentsMay assist with M&A due diligence and leads acquisition integration within the RegionAssumes other special activities and responsibilities from time to time as directed

Requirements

B.S. or B.A. in accounting15+ years of progressive experience in industry accounting with at least 5+ years in percentage completion project accounting environment5+ years experience in a multi-company/multi- location environmentExceptional MS Excel skillsStrong Knowledge of Enterprise Resource System softwareAbility to speak, read and comprehend instructions, short correspondence and policy documents, as well as converse comfortably with all levels of the organizationKnowledge of business and management principlesPrior experience in roofing industry a plus!

Tecta offers a comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision, 401(k) with company match, paid time off, paid holidays, etc.

Pay: $130,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year plus BONUS

Benefits

401(k)401(k) matchingDental insuranceFlexible spending accountHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid time offVision insuranceBonus opportunitiesYearly bonus

Experience Level (if available): Director
